document.full_text: risks that could lead to a property bubble are still building up in china, and more action is needed to cool speculative fervor, the country's banking regulator said on tuesday.
document.title: china bank regulator warns of property bubble risks
lines_and_colors: risks that could lead to a property bubble are still building up in china, and more action is needed to cool speculative fervor, the country's banking regulator said on tuesday.
